format: A data frame with 111 observations on the following 4 variables.
title: Atmospheric environmental conditions in New York City
description:
Description
Daily measurements of ozone concentration, wind speed, temperature and
solar radiation in New York City from May to September of 1973.

parameters.wind: Average wind speed (at 07:00 and 10:00) in miles per hour.
parameters.ozone:
Average ozone concentration (of hourly measurements) of
in parts per billion.
parameters.temperature: Maximum daily emperature in degrees Fahrenheit.
